text: Appa is a fictional flying bison in Nickelodeon's animated television series Avatar: The Last Airbender. The character and series were created by Michael Dante DiMartino and Bryan Konietzko. Appa is voiced by Dee Bradley Baker. ==Other websites== *Appa at Avatar Wikia Category:Animated characters Category:Characters of Avatar: The Last Airbender Category:Fictional characters introduced in 2005 es:Anexo:Personajes de Avatar: la leyenda de Aang#Appa pl:Awatar: Legenda Aanga#Drugoplanowi bohaterowie
title: Appa
